title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover â€“ your all-in-one solution for a safe and comfortable living space for your furry and feathered friends!

Measuring at 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft., this spacious kennel is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, providing ample room for your pets to play and rest. Crafted from galvanized metal iron, this kennel boasts a strong and sturdy construction, with a paint-coated finish that adds a touch of elegance. The rust-resistant and no-sharp-edges design ensures safety and durability, making it a reliable choice for pet owners.

The kennel comes with a waterproof cover made from 210D oxford cloth. This cover is not only windproof and weatherproof but also provides excellent sunshade, ensuring your pets are protected from the elements. Whether it's a hot sunny day or a windy, rainy one, your pets will remain comfortable and safe inside.

The BingoPaw Playpen features a solid latching swing gate and strong latches, providing top-notch security for your pets. The kennel also ensures excellent ventilation, keeping the space fresh and airy for your pets.

Available in small and large sizes, this kennel is suitable for a variety of animals, including dogs, chickens, rabbits, and ducks. The easy-to-install panels make assembly a breeze, allowing you to set up your pet's new home in no time!

Upgrade your pet's living space with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover. Order yours today!
